edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.dlog

Class SigmaDlogProverInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.dlog.SigmaDlogProverInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaProverInput, ZKProverInput

    public class SigmaDlogProverInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProverInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaDlogProver.

    In SigmaProtocolDlog, the prover gets a GroupElement h and a BigInteger w such that g^w = h.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
